translation: Having abandoned attachment to the fruits of the action, ever content, depending on nothing, he does not do anything even while being engaged in activity.
commentary: 4.20 Leaving having abandoned? karmaphalasangam attachment to the fruits of action? Ever satisfied even content? Destitute depending on nothing? in action in action? Involved: engaged? Even even? Not not? Eve verily? A little anything? does does? He.Commentary The same idea of inaction in action is repeated here to produce a deep impression on the minds of the aspirants. He who works for the wellbeing
